con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="FourthWayTransactionService" targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/v1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:mes="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/messages/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/v1" xmlns:fwh="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/header" xmlns:fsb="http://fsb.belgium.be/header" xmlns:frmsg="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/fourthwaymessage" xmlns:funac="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/functionalack" xmlns:tecac="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/technicalack" xmlns:bet="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/businesserror" xmlns:dbtsi="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/debtinquiry" xmlns:ddn="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/debtdeficitnotification"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <!--Fidus XSD--> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/messages/v1" schemaLocation="messages/fourthwayTransactionServiceMessages_v1.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="noticeOneRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="NoticeOneRequest" element="mes:sendNoticeOneRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="noticeOneResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="NoticeOneResponse" element="mes:sendNoticeOneResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="notificationAckRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="NotificationAckRequest" element="mes:sendNotificationAckRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="notificationAckResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="NotificationAckResponse" element="mes:sendNotificationAckResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendNoticeOneAckRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendNoticeOneAckRequest" element="mes:sendNoticeOneAckRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendNoticeOneAckResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendNoticeOneAckResponse" element="mes:sendNoticeOneAckResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendNoticeTwoAckRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendNoticeTwoAckRequest" element="mes:sendNoticeTwoAckRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendNoticeTwoAckResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="SendNoticeTwoAckResponse" element="mes:sendNoticeTwoAckResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="FourthWayTransactionServicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeOne"> <wsdl:input message="tns:noticeOneRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:noticeOneResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNotificationAck"> <wsdl:input message="tns:notificationAckRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:notificationAckResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeOneAck"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendNoticeOneAckRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendNoticeOneAckResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeTwoAck"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendNoticeTwoAckRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendNoticeTwoAckResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="FourthWayTransactionServiceHTTPBinding" type="tns:FourthWayTransactionServicePortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeOne"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://fidus.brussels/services/fourthwaytransactionservice/sendNoticeOne"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNotificationAck"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://fidus.brussels/services/fourthwaytransactionservice/sendNotificationAck"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeOneAck"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourhtwaydebtservice/sendNoticeOneAck"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendNoticeTwoAck"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaydebtservice/sendNoticeTwoAck"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="FourthWayTransactionService_v1"> <wsdl:port name="FourthWayTransactionService_v1" binding="tns:FourthWayTransactionServiceHTTPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://fidus.brussels/services/fourthwaytransactionservice/v1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FourthWay Transaction service WDSL v1.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/messages/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cme="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" xmlns:exc="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/service/fourthwaytransactionservice/messages/v1" xmlns:not="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NotificationAck" xmlns:not1="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOne" xmlns:tecac="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/technicalack" xmlns:ack1="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOneAck" xmlns:ack2="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeTwoAck"> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" schemaLocation="baseMessageTypes_v1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" schemaLocation="exceptionTypes_v1.xsd"/> <!--Fedict XSD--> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOne" schemaLocation="../XMLSchema/noticeOne.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NotificationAck" schemaLocation="../XMLSchema/notificationAck.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/technicalack" schemaLocation="../XMLSchema/technicalacknowledgement.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOneAck" schemaLocation="../XMLSchema/Notice1Ack.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeTwoAck" schemaLocation="../XMLSchema/Notice2Ack.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="NotificationAckRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:RequestMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="cme:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="request" type="tns:NotificationAckRq"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotificationAckRq"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="not:NotificationAckRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotificationAckResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:ResponseMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="responses" type="tns:ResponsesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Technical errors that occur when processing the message context e.g. insufficient rights.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:RequestMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="cme:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="request" type="tns:NoticeOneRq"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneRq"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="not1:NoticeOneRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:ResponseMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="responses" type="tns:ResponsesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Technical errors that occur when processing the message context e.g. insufficient rights.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeOneAckRq"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ack1:NoticeOneAckRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeTwoAckRq"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ack2:NoticeTwoAckRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeOneAckRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:RequestMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="cme:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="request" type="tns:SendNoticeOneAckRq"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeTwoAckRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:RequestMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="cme:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="request" type="tns:SendNoticeTwoAckRq"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeOneAckResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:ResponseMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="responses" type="tns:ResponsesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Technical errors that occur when processing the message context e.g. insufficient rights.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendNoticeTwoAckResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:ResponseMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="responses" type="tns:ResponsesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Technical errors that occur when processing the message context e.g. insufficient rights.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponsesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="tns:ResponseType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="tecac:technicalAcknowledgement"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business exceptions that occur when processing the request or response e.g. missing data for a single response element. Exceptions at this level may contain back-end specific codes and content.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Element of the request and the response--> <xsd:element name="sendNotificationAckRequest" type="tns:NotificationAckRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNotificationAckResponse" type="tns:NotificationAckResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeOneRequest" type="tns:NoticeOneRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeOneResponse" type="tns:NoticeOneResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeOneAckRequest" type="tns:SendNoticeOneAckRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeOneAckResponse" type="tns:SendNoticeOneAckResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeTwoAckRequest" type="tns:SendNoticeTwoAckRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="sendNoticeTwoAckResponse" type="tns:SendNoticeTwoAckResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cmn="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/v1" xmlns:nps="http://fidus.brussels/service/personservice/personservices/naturalPerson/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1"> <xsd:simpleType name="OkType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="OK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOK"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Unformatted message Id--> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--National Number of the person. Format depending on the Register--> <xsd:simpleType name="PersonNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([0][0-9])|([1][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))(([0-9]{2}[1-9])|([0-9][1-9][0-9])|([1-9][0-9]{2}))(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>National Register format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([2][0-9])|([3][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CBSS Register format: Bis Register</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([4][0-9])|([5][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CBSS Register format: Ter Register</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Request message context--> <xsd:complexType name="RequestMessageContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message context block generated by the consumer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Consumer must assign their own MessageId reference for the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timestamp when client sent request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Response message context--> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseMessageContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>MessageContext block generated by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier generated by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique ID returned to the client for tracing purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="relatesTo" type="tns:MessageIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional field. The unique id of a previous batch file in this exchange Only used for responses.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Time reply was sent by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Legal Context : the finality of the Privacy Commission--> <xsd:simpleType name="LegalContextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user context defines information regarding the actual user performing a request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="language" type="xsd:language" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The preferred language of the actual user performing the request. This influences the language in which response elements are cast.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1"> <!--Basic error typed--> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exception" type="tns:ExceptionType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:ExceptionClassType"/> <xsd:element name="code" type="tns:ExceptionCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="source" type="tns:ExceptionSourceType"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="tns:ExceptionDescriptionType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionClassType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WARNING"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionSourceType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionDescriptionType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOne" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common" xmlns="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NoticeOne"> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common" schemaLocation="common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="NoticeOneResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The synchronous answer returned by the FSB</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ResponseData" type="common:GeneralResponseDataType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ResponseStatus" type="common:statusType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NoticeOneRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message send to the FSB by a public officer when a transaction occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestData" type="NoticeOneRequestDataType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="requestContext" type="common:requestContextType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Required by FSB for routing and supervision purpose.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Version" type="xsd:decimal" fixed="2.5" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TotalInvolvedNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to calculate occurence of parties, goods, ...</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AcquisitionDateAndModeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>How and when the current owner got the good</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneDossierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Folder-related data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionType" type="common:TransactionTypeType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ReferenceNumber" type="common:ReferenceNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Language" type="common:language" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Folder's language</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DossierCosts" type="common:AmountType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="TotalInvolvedParties" type="TotalInvolvedNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="TotalInvolvedGoods" type="TotalInvolvedNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="VATAlienation" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>information needed by the financial sector. Not to be sent to other peers. Present if the there is an alienation regarding the VAT</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType/> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneRequestDataType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business part of the Request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ShortRequestId" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specific RequestId has a length of 17 instead of 20. This should be used to call the FSB for a notice1.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="17"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Origin" type="common:GeneralInterfaceType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The interface type of the origin.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Recipient" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Possible values: SocialSecurity, Finances, Vlabel, or the identifying EnterpriseNumber of a connected entity (e.g. Antwerpen, Namur, ...).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProcedureNumber" type="common:ProcedureNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The procedure number attributed to the notice1 by the public officer and mentioned in any subsequent message related to that procedure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ReplacedProcedureNumber" type="common:ProcedureNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>When the notary/bailiff resends a notice1 because he made a mistake, the previous procedure id is mentioned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DossierInfo" type="NoticeOneDossierType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="DescriptionGoods" type="NoticeOneGoodType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="MovableSale" type="MovableSaleType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="DescriptionParties" type="common:PartyType" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parties involved in the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequesterInfo" type="common:RequesterType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Informations concerning the message sender.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ContactPerson" type="common:ContactType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The contact person from the sender</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequestDate" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the exact date in format : CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Ownership" type="SalerOwnershipType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Succession" type="SuccessionType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Inheritance" type="InheritanceType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneShipPropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Ship or boat.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="common:ShipNameType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="PlaceOfConstruction" type="common:ShipPlaceOfConstructionType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="DateOfConstruction" type="xsd:date" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Dimension" type="common:ShipDimensionType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Weight" type="common:ShipWeightType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Engine" type="common:ShipEngineType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="NumeroHypoteques" type="common:ShipHypotequeNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Required for sea transport but not for river navigation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PropertyNumber" type="common:GoodNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="AcquisitionDateAndMode" type="AcquisitionDateAndModeType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="SituationOfGood" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the mortgage if any</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PriceEstimation" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Price estimation of the good in € until eurocent.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InheritedFrom" type="common:InheritageFromType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SuccessionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Always required when transaction type = 7</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Deceased" type="common:PartyNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The deceased person is one of the parties potentially having debts. A reference to the party is given. The person details of the deceased person are available in the description parties element.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneRealEstateType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Real estate</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PropertyType" type="common:PropertyTypeType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="PropertyDescription" type="common:PropertyDescription" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="PropertyNumber" type="common:GoodNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Address" type="common:GoodAddressType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The address of the Real Estate.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SuperFicie" type="common:SuperficieType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Division" type="common:DivisionType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ReferentieKadaster" type="common:ReferentieKadasterType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="AcquisitionDateAndMode" type="AcquisitionDateAndModeType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="SituationOfGood" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the mortgage if any</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PriceEstimation" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Price estimation of the sold good in € until eurocent.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NonResident" type="common:NonResidentType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Needed when the two following conditions are satisfied at the same time : (1) one of the parties owning the current good does not reside in Belgium AND some professional activities where carried out in the good</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InheritedFrom" type="common:InheritageFromType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NoticeOneGoodType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Always required except for transaction type 1.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ImmovableProperty" type="NoticeOneRealEstateType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For Real Estate</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DescriptionShip" type="NoticeOneShipPropertyType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For ships and boats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SalerOwnershipType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyNumber" type="common:PartyNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="GoodNumber" type="common:GoodNumberType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MovableSaleType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Always required when transaction type = 1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Benefit" type="common:AmountType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount the notary/baillif has after the sale</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Date" type="xsd:date" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of the sale in format YYYY-MM-DD. Mandatory for Bailiffs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InheritanceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Always required when transaction type = 7; Per party, the deceased excluded, the inheritance portion is defined.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InheritancePortion" type="common:InheritancePortionType" maxOccurs="unbounded" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common"> <xsd:simpleType name="OfficeNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The office number at the FRNB/KFBN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:totalDigits value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PurchaserNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identification of the purchaser in the xml message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReferenceNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The folder reference of the notary/bailiff</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ForeignJuridicalFormType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Juridical form of company, any form including foreign ones</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="InstitutionNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of a Public Actor</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PeopleNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of a person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CreditorKindType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of creditor. 1 = opposing, 2 = registered</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="opposed"/> <xsd:enumeration value="registered"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="HouseNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>house number type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipHypotequeNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EnterpriseNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>enterprise name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="160"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipWeightType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tonnage description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PropertyTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="GeneralInterfaceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Public Officer's Interface Identifier ESUC ontvangstskantoor registratie/ bureau d'enregistrement - Succession EDVA Dienst Vastgoedakten ECAC Aankoopcomité / comité d'acquisition ERDR Registratie der domeinen/Receveur des domaines</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ENOT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EHUI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ECAC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ESUC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EDVA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERDR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipDimensionType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PartyNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identification of the party in the xml message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\p{N}{3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BelgianJuridicalFormType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Juridical form following the KBO/BCE standards at http://www.mineco.be/enterprises/crossroads_bank/xls/rechtsv.xls</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PersonNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Social security identification number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\p{N}{11}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TransactionTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The (coded) type of transaction. Codes are : 1 = verkoop roerend / vente mobilière, 2 = hypothecaire aanwending / affectation hypothécaire, 3 = vervreemding / aliénation, 4 = beslag onder derden / saisie-arrêt (restricted to the Social Security), 5 = Hypotheekstelling verbonden aan de verwerving / Affectation hypothécaire liée à l'acquisition, 6 = Aanwending / Imputation (restricted to the Social Security), 7 = Erfenis / Heritage</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="7"/> <xsd:minInclusive value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EnterpriseNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number of enterprise identificator from BCE/KBO</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\p{N}{10}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MunicipalityCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>INS/NIS code for municipality.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:totalDigits value="5"/> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipEngineType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ProcedureNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identifier of a procedure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DepartmentNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>BCE/KBO enterprise identification number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="3"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="country"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Country codes must be in the ISO-3166 two-letter format. For a complete list, see http://www.iso.org/iso/en/prods-services/iso3166ma/02iso-3166-code-lists/index.html The FSB will translate the ISO code into specific KBO codes, if required. The ISO standards permit certain two-letter codes to be customized by users. This allows for the following codes, which can be used withing the PROVE application: ISO CODE KBO CODE meaning XA 900 stateless (when applied to nationalities) XB 901 not yet proven (when applied to nationalities) XC 992 moved to abroad (when applied nationalities) XD 995 at sea (international waters) XE 999 undetermined
Validation rules: - two upper case letters
Regular expression: [A-Z]{2}
Examples: BE, NL, FR, DE, GB, ES, ... (Note that UK is not a valid country code!)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PropertyDescription"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReferentieKadasterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The cadastral reference is a NOT YET SPECIFIED structured communication.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SuperficieType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="19"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Amounts expressed in euros</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:double"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipNameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipPlaceOfConstructionType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelephoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Telephone number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[+][\p{N}]{1,5}[\p{Zs}][\p{N}]{1,5}[\p{Zs}][\p{N}]{1,10}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="GoodNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identification of the good in the xml message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StreetCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>General type used to define the requestId, unique identifier of a message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="language"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Dutch, French or German, following the ISO 639-1 standard. Case insensitive. Lowercase recommended.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:language"> <xsd:pattern value="[Ff][Rr]"/> <xsd:pattern value="[Nn][Ll]"/> <xsd:pattern value="[Dd][Ee]"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostalCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postal code matching the municipality or main municipality</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IncompleteBirthdateType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>used instead of xsd:date for the date as : 00-00-2007</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="YYYY" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>year</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MM" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>month, please insert 00 if unknown</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DD" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>day, please insert 00 if unknown</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="31"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ForeignAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A foreign address type. Beware length of fields are different than belgian addresses.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CountryDescription" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The textual country description in the folder language.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The ISO country code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="country"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Province" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element has not to be transmitted to the BCSS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityDescription" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityCode" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality code following INS/NIS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="MunicipalityCodeType"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostalCode" type="PostalCodeType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postal code matching the municipality or main municipality</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Street" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseNumber" type="HouseNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>House number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseIndexNumber" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>mailbox number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressComplement" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element has not to be transmitted to the BCSS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredEnterpriseByInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Enterprise info for foreign enterprise</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EnterpriseName" type="EnterpriseNameType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the company corresponding to the KBO number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="JuridicalForm" type="ForeignJuridicalFormType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Juridical form following the KBO/BCE standards at http://www.mineco.be/enterprises/crossroads_bank/xls/rechtsv.xls</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreationDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of creation in format YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ContactType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>People to contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the contact person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FirstNames" form="qualified"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Email" type="EmailType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The email of the contact person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumber" type="TelephoneType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The telephone number of the contact Person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FaxNumber" type="TelephoneType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The fax number of the contact Person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="requestInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Request identification.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">the id of the request that should be unique in time and place.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timeStamp" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">the time the request was initiated by the client.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HelpdeskType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>When the institution has an helpdesk available, the contact information can be listed here.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumber" type="TelephoneType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The telephone number of the helpdesk</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FaxNumber" type="TelephoneType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The fax number of the helpdesk</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="EmailType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The email of the helpdesk</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="VATUnitMemberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Field to describe a member or a manager of VAT unit</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="VATUnitNumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="VATOtherInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information needed by the financial sector. Not to be sent to other peers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="CasualVATSubject" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FR : assujetti occasionnel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ForeignEstablishedVATSubject" type="ForeignEstablishedVATSubjectType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FR : assujetti étranger avec un représentant en Belgique</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AssociationMember" type="AssociationMemberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FR : membre d’une association de fait ou momentanée</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="VATUnitMember" type="VATUnitMemberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FR : membre (et/ou responsable) d’une Unité TVA</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleActorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Person and/or Enterprise w/ or W/o Address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="MPE" type="MoralPersonEnterpriseType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="PPE" type="PhysicalPersonEnterpriseType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="NP" type="NaturalPersonType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="consumerInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Consumer description.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">the application's name : in case of certification, it must be the server's common name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="userInfo" type="userInfoType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Required for messages from the Public Officers.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="userInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">End user</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">the user identification from the application point of view.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="language" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The language in which any textual fields are expressed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:whiteSpace value="collapse"/> <xsd:length value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="de"/> <xsd:enumeration value="fr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="nl"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InstitutionIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identification information of the sending institution.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="KBONumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The enterprise number identifying the institution.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InstitutionName" type="InstitutionNameType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the institution that corresponds with the given enterprise number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="BelgianAddressType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MoralPersonEnterpriseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Enterprise" type="RequiredEnterpriseType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>exists if this party is an enterprise. info given by de requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="GeneralAddressType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GoodAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address of a belgian good.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityDescription" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityCode" type="MunicipalityCodeType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality code following INS/NIS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostalCode" type="PostalCodeType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postal code matching the municipality or main municipality</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Street" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>street name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseNumber" type="HouseNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>House number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseIndexNumber" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the mailbox number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InstitutionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Institution issuing the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the notary/bailiff institution</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InstitutionNumber" type="InstitutionNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Address" type="BelgianAddressType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The address of the notary/bailiff institution</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PartyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Part of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyNumber" type="PartyNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Actor" type="SimpleActorType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="BelgianResident" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Does the party reside in belgium ? yes -->true no -->false N/A --> null</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SubjectToVAT" type="xsd:boolean" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="VATOtherInfo" type="VATOtherInfoType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>information needed by the financial sector. Not to be sent to other peers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AssociationMemberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Field to describe a member of an fact association or temporary</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Association" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BelgianAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The belgian address type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityDescription" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MunicipalityCode" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Municipality code following INS/NIS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="MunicipalityCodeType"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostalCode" type="PostalCodeType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postal code matching the municipality or main municipality</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Street" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseNumber" type="HouseNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>House number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HouseIndexNumber" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>mailbox number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="StreetCode" type="StreetCodeType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street code needed by the financial sector. Should be taken away when Finance is able to standardize.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MortgageTakerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Actor" type="SimpleActorType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CreditorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identified creditor (opponant or mortgagee).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreditorKind" type="CreditorKindType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="CreditDate" type="xsd:date" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="CreditAmount" type="AmountType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Actor" type="SimpleActorType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DestinationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Public Actor which is the final destination of the message (notice2) + reference to the notification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="SocialSecurity" type="SocialActorType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Finance" type="FiscalActorType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ConnectedEntity" type="ConnectedEntityType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="requestContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Required by FSB for routing and supervision purpose.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestInfo" type="requestInfoType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Contains all the information specific to a message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="consumerInfo" type="consumerInfoType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Contains all the information specific to a user</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GeneralAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The address that the notary or bailiff has supplied</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="BelgianAddress" type="BelgianAddressType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ForeignAddress" type="ForeignAddressType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="UnstructuredAddress" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InheritancePortionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Per party, the deceased excluded, the inheritance portion is defined. The inheritance portion is defined as a fraction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyNumber" type="PartyNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Fraction" type="FractionType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DivisionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="NumeroDeDivision" form="qualified"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="99999"/> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NumeroDeSection" form="qualified"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NumeroDeParcelle" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>matrice cadastrale</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="150"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NonResidentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Accounting information to specify when the owners do not reside in Belgium</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AcquisitionDate" type="xsd:date" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>date when the good was bought by the current owner</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InvestementAmount" type="AmountType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total amount of the investment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransferDate" type="xsd:date" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="TransferPrice" type="AmountType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="TransferExpenses" type="AmountType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ContactName" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>contact person which can give accounting information to the public actor</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ContactTelephone" type="TelephoneType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NaturalPersonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="People" type="RequiredPeopleType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>exists if this party is a natural person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="GeneralAddressType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredEnterpriseByNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Enterprise info for belgian enterprise</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EnterpriseNumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The KBO number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EnterpriseName" type="EnterpriseNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the company corresponding to the KBO number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="JuridicalForm" type="BelgianJuridicalFormType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Juridical form following the KBO/BCE standards at http://www.mineco.be/enterprises/crossroads_bank/xls/rechtsv.xls</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreationDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of creation in format YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PurchaserType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Purchaser of the concerned goods.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PurchaserNumber" type="PurchaserNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Actor" type="SimpleActorType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Portion of the inheritance, defined as a fraction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Numerator" type="xsd:integer" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Denominator" type="xsd:integer" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Institution issuing the request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InstitutionIdentification" type="InstitutionIdentificationType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Helpdesk" type="HelpdeskType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="GeneralInformation" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Additional information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GeneralResponseDataType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information about the request for a technical ack</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ProcedureNumber" type="ProcedureNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="RequestId" type="RequestIdType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequesterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requester of the notice message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequesterType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of requester. 1 = Notaris/Notaire/Notar, 2 = Deurwaarder/huissier/Gerichtsvollzieher, 3 = Ontvanger der domeinen/Receveur des domaines/Einnehmer der Domänenverwaltung, 4 = Aankoopcomité/Comité d’acquisition/Ankaufskommission 5 = COIV Centraal Orgaan voor Inbeslagname en verbeurdverklaring 6 = ontvangstskantoor registratie/ bureau d'enregistrement - Succession 7 = Dienst Vastgoedakten</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="1"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="7"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Institution" type="InstitutionType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the institution of the notary / bailiff</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PhysicalRequester" type="OfficerType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Email" type="EmailType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The email of the institution or physical requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumber" type="TelephoneType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The telephone number of the institution or physical requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FaxNumber" type="TelephoneType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The fax number of the instituion or physical requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EndUser" type="PersonNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identity number of the effective end user</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="statusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>status of the reply</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="suggested_action" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredEnterpriseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Enterprise information required for processing</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ByNumber" type="RequiredEnterpriseByNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Search criteria for belgian company</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ByInfo" type="RequiredEnterpriseByInfoType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Search criteria for foreign company</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredPeopleByNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="PeopleNameType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="FirstNames" type="PeopleNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="BirthDate" type="IncompleteBirthdateType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The birthdate of the targeted person.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OfficerType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Public officer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PersonNumber" type="PersonNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RN number of the requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Name" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FirstNames" form="qualified"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SocialActorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Institution issuing the request. This is used when a notification has been sent from this part.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InstitutionNumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The enterprise number of the Social Actor.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CorrelationId" type="RequestIdType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The requestId of the Notification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotificationDate" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredPeopleByNumberType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PersonNumber" type="PersonNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number from the Registre national</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Name" type="PeopleNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="FirstNames" type="PeopleNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequiredPeopleType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ByNumber" type="RequiredPeopleByNumberType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ByName" type="RequiredPeopleByNameType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ForeignEstablishedVATSubjectType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Field to describe a foreign person that is represented in Belgium by an enterprise</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RepresentativeEnterprise" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AckInformationBottomType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information to be sent back for acknowledgment for up-down communication (ack from client to server - for notification)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ReceivedNotificationTimeStamp" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date and time when the notification was recieved by FRNB</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotificationAcknowledgmentTimeStamp" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date and time when the notification aknowledgement was send by the FRNB</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PhysicalPersonEnterpriseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="People" type="RequiredPeopleType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>exists if this party is a natural person</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Enterprise" type="RequiredEnterpriseType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>exists if this party is an enterprise. info given by de requester</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="GeneralAddressType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InstitutionNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The identification number of the notary/bailiff institution</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EnterpriseNumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="OfficeNumber" type="OfficeNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InheritageFromType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Origin of a heritage, should NOT be given to BCSS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PersonNumber" type="PersonNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number from the Registre national</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Name" type="PeopleNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="FirstNames" type="PeopleNameType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="BirthDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="BirthPlace" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NonResident" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0" default="false" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>True when the person did not reside in Belgium.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BCENumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" minOccurs="0" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Enterprise number from KBO/BCE</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConnectedEntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConnectedEntityName" type="xsd:string" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The short name of the connected entity, e.g. Antwerpen, Namur, ... .</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KBONumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The enterprise number identifying the entity. This is the unique ID of the entity, allowing to differentiate between entities with similar names (e.g. Stad Antwerpen and Provincie Antwerpen)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CorrelationId" type="RequestIdType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reference of notification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotificationDate" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FiscalActorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Institution issuing the request. This is used when a notification has been sent</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DepartmentNumber" type="DepartmentNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Department Number at the CCFF.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CorrelationId" type="RequestIdType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reference of notification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotificationDate" type="xsd:dateTime" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Version 2.5.3--> <xsd:complexType name="AckInformationTopType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information to be sent back for acknowledgment for down-up communication (ack from server to client)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AcknowledgementDate" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date when the ACK was send to the concerned Public Officer. For notice1,tt starts the legal notification period. It can differ from the timereceiverequest date.
