For notice2, it starts the legal period for SPF FIN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TimeReceiveRequest" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date and time when the orginial message is received by BCSS or by CCFF.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ReceivingInstitutions" type="ReceivingInstitutionsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PartyIDType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The way to identify a party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="PersonNumber" type="PersonNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number from Registre national</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EnterpriseNumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number from BCE/KBO</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PublicOfficerInterfaceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identification of a Public Officer's</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="GeneralIdentification" type="GeneralInterfaceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ENOT for notary, EFIN for public notaries</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SectorIdentification" type="SectorIdentificationType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SectorIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>identification code from BCSS for that sector</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ReceivingInstitutionsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The list of Public Actors that received the original message. When the list is empty, the party is UNKNOWN by the sector.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="KBONumber" type="EnterpriseNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The enterprise number of the institution.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InstitutionName" type="InstitutionNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the institution.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="BelgianAddressType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NotificationAck" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common" xmlns="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/NotificationAck"> <xsd:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/fourthway/v2/Common" schemaLocation="common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="NotificationAckRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message send to the FSB by a public officer when a transaction occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestData" type="NotificationAckRequestDataType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business part of the Request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequestContext" type="common:requestContextType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Required by FSB for routing and supervision purpose.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Version" type="xsd:decimal" fixed="2.5" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotificationAckResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The synchronous answer returned by the FSB</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ResponseData" type="common:GeneralResponseDataType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ResponseStatus" type="common:statusType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="NotificationAckRequestDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestId" type="common:RequestIdType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Origin" type="common:GeneralInterfaceType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="Destination" type="common:DestinationType" form="qualified"/> <xsd:element name="ProcedureNumber" type="common:ProcedureNumberType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The procedure number attributed to the notice1 by the public officer and mentioned in any subsequent message related to that procedure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Sender" type="common:SenderType" form="qualified"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the institution sending this acknowledgement message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AckInformation" type="common:AckInformationBottomType" form="qualified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2010 (http://www.altova.com) by Johan Schurgers (I8C)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/generalcaseinformation" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0.4" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cin="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/generalcaseinformation" xmlns:hdr="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/header" xmlns:con="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/contact" xmlns:addn="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/common/addressinformation" xmlns:dts="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/common/datatypes" xmlns:insti="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/institution"> <xs:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/common/datatypes" schemaLocation="datatypes.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/contact" schemaLocation="contact.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/common/addressinformation" schemaLocation="addressinformation.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/institution" schemaLocation="institution.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>General case information is extra information that is generic for several transactions.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="AdministrativeInformationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Administrative information is used for all common information about a case that will determine the further response of the case. The administrative information supports the case but doesn't add business value to the case.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="language" type="xs:string" nillable="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Language the case will be handled in. The possible languages are: NL and FR</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="caseNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Case number assigned by the sender of the message. This number is the internal reference used by the sender of the message to facilitate communication. The electronic form of the "our reference" on paper.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="referenceNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Only need for 2.5 conversion</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transactionType" type="xs:string" nillable="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transactiontype of the case. (1-7)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="procedureNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The procedure id is the business key that will be used to communicate between all partner in reference to this case.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="replacedProcedureNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>When a rectification of a case is needed. The public officer will send a new message with a new procedure number. The old procedure number will be filled in the replacedprocedurenumber. The receiving parties can use this to stop processing the old case.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="requestDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date when the case was created to be send. This date can differ from the message date. Cases can be created and send at another time by the systems. The requestDate is the official date the message has been intended to be send by the person who created the message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="origin" type="dts:OriginType" nillable="false"/> <xs:element name="destinations" type="dts:DestinationType" nillable="false"/> <xs:element name="requestorInformation" type="cin:RequestorInformationType" nillable="false"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestorInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="insti:institution"/> <xs:element name="responsiblePerson" type="con:ContactPersonType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Person that is responsible for the message. The notary or the public officer who signs the notification.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="contactPerson" type="con:ContactPersonType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Casehandler at the institution.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="generalInformation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>General information the requestor wants to share. (ex. website, opening hours, name changes, ...)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="generalCaseInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Every business message will need shared data about the case.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="administrativeInformation" type="cin:AdministrativeInformationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All common information about a case that will determine the further response of the case. The administrative information supports the case but doesn't add business value to the case.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2010 (http://www.altova.com) by Johan Schurgers (I8C)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/legalbase" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0.4" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:lbs="http://fsb.belgium.be/FourthWayServices/legalbase"> <xs:complexType name="LegalBaseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="legalSource" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The source where the legal base is in defined.
